name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Nathaniel WILLIAMS, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Nathaniel WILLIAMS, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Thomas L. McGill, Jr., Philadelphia (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., Gail Thackeray, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
445 A.2d 498
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Nathaniel WILLIAMS, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted April 16, 1982.
Decided May 25, 1982.
Thomas L. McGill, Jr., Philadelphia (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., Gail Thackeray, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
